p: Drug likeness properties of the selected compounds were determined using criteria put forward by Lipinski. The result present in Table 3 and presents shown shows the parameter assessed, the scores and the reference value for each parameter, respectively. Harpagide 5-O-Î²-D-glucopyranoside showed strong compliance with respect to number of hydrogen bond donors, LogP and molar refractivity, except for hydrogen bond acceptors.
